actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend and extend a provision of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, as amended.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow sums allotted to the States under the treatment works construction grant program for fiscal year 1978 and subsequent years to remain available for the fiscal year authorized and for the period of the next succeeding 24 months.

titles.title: A bill to amend and extend a provision of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, as amended.
